notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: LS and LZ designed the study; YL1 ( corresponding to Yiping Li), HY, YL2 ( corresponding to Ye Li) YL, HY, LY jk and DW participated in the process of sequences editing and phylogenetic analyses; YF, LS and YZ performed statistical analysis; SL, DY and WL collected sample and the demographic data; LS, QW and YF participated in the writing process. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
